attributes.additional_details: Please sign this to help save Royston Fire Station from closure. SYFRS have proposed to close the front line fire station to save themselves £160,000 a drop in the ocean for the 10 million they might need to save. The closure of this station would leave Royston short of fire cover and would only leave the Barnsley area with 3 appliances that's if the CARP is on the run please sign and help our community keep it's fire station
